trans-unit.source: The automation module can monitor changes to files and folders. Based on custom settings and associated file processing tasks, this module can automatically perform the corresponding actions.
trans-unit.target: 自动化模块能够对文件和文件夹的变动进行监控。依据自定义设置以及与之关联的文件处理任务，该模块可自动执行相应的操作。

trans-unit.source: Regularly execute according to the set time
trans-unit.target: 根据设定的时间定期执行

trans-unit.source: Perform periodic execution according to the set plan
trans-unit.target: 根据设定的计划进行周期性执行

trans-unit.source: Associate tasks with automatic execution methods. The selected tasks will appear on the right side and will be associated after saving
trans-unit.target: 将任务与自动执行方法关联。所选任务将显示在右侧，并将在保存后进行关联

trans-unit.source: EasyTidy can automatically process and organize files and folders. It can filter files by various conditions such as name and directory. Supports manual and automatic execution. You can set delay, time interval or customize the execution cycle with CRON expression for easy and efficient file management.
trans-unit.target: EasyTidy 可自动处理和组织文件及文件夹。能按名称、目录等多种条件过滤文件，支持手动和自动执行，可设置延时、时间间隔或用 CRON 表达式自定义执行周期，让文件管理轻松高效。
trans-unit.note: EasyTidy can automatically process and organize files and folders. It can filter files by various conditions such as name and directory. Supports manual and automatic execution. You can set delay, time interval or customize the execution cycle with CRON expression for easy and efficient file management.

trans-unit.source: Select the theme that suits your mood and preference. You can choose from dark, light, or system themes.
trans-unit.target: 选择适合您心情和偏好的主题。您可以从深色、浅色或系统主题中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Sync your app’s color with your Windows accent color. You can open the Windows accent color setting by clicking this card.
trans-unit.target: 将应用程序的颜色与 Windows 强调色同步。您可以通过单击此卡打开 Windows 强调色设置。

trans-unit.source: Easily add files that need to be filtered to achieve precise management of specific files. By adding file processing rules, you can customize the way files are processed to meet individual needs. At the same time, you can also use the powerful pattern matching function of regular expressions to further refine the filtering and processing logic of files, making file management more efficient and intelligent. Whether you want to exclude specific types of files or perform special processing on files that match specific patterns, you can easily do it here.
trans-unit.target: 轻松地添加需要过滤的文件，实现对特定文件的精准管理。通过增加文件处理规则，你能够自定义文件的处理方式，满足个性化的需求。同时，还可以利用正则表达式强大的模式匹配功能，进一步细化文件的筛选和处理逻辑，让文件管理更加高效、智能。无论是排除特定类型的文件，还是对符合特定模式的文件进行特殊处理，都能在这里轻松实现。
至少一个单词（区分大小写）

trans-unit.source: All words in a random order
trans-unit.target: 以随意的顺序的所有单词

trans-unit.source: All words in arbitrary order (case sensitive)
trans-unit.target: 以随意的顺序的所有单词（区分大小写）

trans-unit.source: If the sizes are different, cover them

trans-unit.target: 添加自定义附加的过滤器

trans-unit.source: Please select a folder, the default is the desktop
trans-unit.target: 请选择文件夹，默认为桌面

trans-unit.source: Desktop shortcut to the destination folder
trans-unit.target: 目标文件夹桌面快捷方式

trans-unit.source: Support CRON expression, and CRON expression has higher priority than the values of the first five items
trans-unit.target: 支持CRON表达式，CRON表达式优先级高于前5项的值

trans-unit.source: It will run when the time unit matches the value below.
trans-unit.target: 时间单位匹配下方的值时，将会运行。

trans-unit.source: Val1, Val2, ..., ValN Match Value List
Match values range from n1 to n2
n1-n2/n3 matches the range n1 to n2 for step n3
trans-unit.target: n1-n2/n3 与步骤n3匹配范围n1到n2

trans-unit.source: Example: Minutes = 15 Hours = 03 Month = 3-10/3 Day of the week = 1,3,5 The tasks will run at 3:15 AM on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays in March, June, and September.
trans-unit.target: 示列：分钟=15 小时=03 月份=3-10/3 每个星期的第几天=1,3,5任务将会在3，6，9月的每周1，3，5早上3点15分运行。

trans-unit.source: Process subfolders and scan the contents of the folder
trans-unit.target: 处理子文件夹并扫描文件夹内部

trans-unit.source: Ignore files that are currently in use by other applications
trans-unit.target: 忽略正在被其他应用程序使用的文件

trans-unit.source: Ignore irrelevant files or folders as well as system file folders
trans-unit.target: 忽略无关的文件或者文件夹以及系统文件文件夹

trans-unit.source: Ignore files that size = 0 or empty folder
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小为0的文件或者空文件夹

trans-unit.source: Minimize to the notification area on startup
trans-unit.target: 启动时最小化到通知区域

trans-unit.source: If necessary, EasyTidy will automatically restart. Check the automatic backup to back up every time the software starts
trans-unit.target: 如果有需要，EasyTidy将自动重启，勾选自动备份将在每次软件启动时进行备份

trans-unit.source: Users can add file processing tasks and professionally configure the execution mode, including selecting automatic execution, one-time execution only, and creating desktop shortcuts and adding backup tasks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可添加文件处理任务，并能够对其执行方式进行专业设置，包括选择自动执行、仅执行一次，亦或是创建桌面快捷方式、添加备份任务等操作。

trans-unit.source: Add files to a tidy task
trans-unit.target: 添加文件自动整理的任务

trans-unit.source: Change the appearance of the backdrop material behind your app. You can choose from mica, acrylic, or transparent options.
trans-unit.target: 更改您应用程序背景的外观效果。您可以选择云母、亚克力或透明选项。

trans-unit.source: EasyTidy will use OS language by default
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下 EasyTidy 将使用 OS 语言

trans-unit.source: Restart EasyTidy for language change to effect
trans-unit.target: 重启 EasyTidy 以使语言更改生效

trans-unit.source: Please enter or select a group name

trans-unit.target: 桌面快捷方式创建失败

trans-unit.source: Please select a backup folder path
trans-unit.target: 请选择备份文件夹路径
所有不含其他匹配的文件夹
所有以 "robot" 开头的文件夹
所有包含 "robot" 的文件夹
所有位于"C:下的名为 "robot" 的文件夹
使用 ";" 或 "|" 来分隔

trans-unit.source: Use "/" to exclude folders starting with "my"
trans-unit.target: 使用 "/" 来不包含由 "my" 开头的文件夹
所有不含其他匹配的文件
所有扩展名为 "jpg" 的文件
所有以 "penguin" 开头的文件
使用 ";" 或 "|" 來分隔

trans-unit.source: Use "/" to exclude files starting with "sea"
trans-unit.target: 使用 "/" 排除以 "sea "开头的文件
用于处理文件夹的规则

trans-unit.source: Validation was successful, execution time of the past {0} times
trans-unit.target: 验证成功，最近{0}次的执行时间

trans-unit.source: Verification failed, conflict between day of the week and day of the month
trans-unit.target: 验证失败，每个星期第几天跟每月第几天存在冲突

trans-unit.source: We found a new version {0} Created at {1} and Published at {2}
trans-unit.target: 我们发现了一个新版本{0}创建于{1}发布于{2}

trans-unit.source: Replace Using File Creation Date & Time
trans-unit.target: 替换使用文件创建日期和时间

trans-unit.source: Years may be represented by four or five digits, depending on the calendaring system used.
trans-unit.target: 由四位或者五位数字表示年份，具体取决于使用的日历。

trans-unit.source: Years represented only by the last two digits. For single-digit years, a leading zero has been added.
trans-unit.target: 仅由最后两位数字表示的年份，对于单位数年份，添加了前导零。

trans-unit.source: Only the last digit of the year is represented.
trans-unit.target: 仅由最后一位数字表示年份。

trans-unit.source: A month as a numeral, leading zero means unit month.
trans-unit.target: 月作为数字，前导零表示单位月。

trans-unit.source: Names of days of the week.
Months without a leading zero as a digit for the units place.
trans-unit.target: 单位数月份没有前导零的月份作为数字。

trans-unit.source: Abbreviated names of the days of the week.
A day of the month, written with a numeral, with leading zeros indicating days with only one significant digit.
trans-unit.target: 一个月中的某一天，以数字表示，前导零表示一位数的天数。

trans-unit.source: A day of the month represented as a number, without a leading zero for single-digit days.
trans-unit.target: 一个月中的某一天为数字，在一位数的天数中不带前导零。

trans-unit.source: The number of hours with leading zeros in 1-digit hours.
trans-unit.target: 以1位数小时为前导零的小时数。

trans-unit.source: An hour number without any leading zero for a one-digit hour count.
trans-unit.target: 一位数小时数不带前导零的小时数。

trans-unit.source: Number of minutes with leading zero (the minutes as a one-digit number).
trans-unit.target: 带前导零的分钟数(以一位数为单位的分钟数)。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes without leading zeros.
trans-unit.target: 一位数分钟数不带前导零的分钟数。

trans-unit.source: Seconds leading with a single digit second prepended with a zero.
trans-unit.target: 以1位数秒为前导零的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Number of seconds without leading zeros in single digits.
trans-unit.target: 在一位数秒内不带前导零的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Millisecond, represented by padding three digits.
trans-unit.target: 用完整三位数表示的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Millisecond count represented by just the first two digits.
trans-unit.target: 仅由前两位数字表示的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Milliseconds since the epoch expressed as the number of whole milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 仅由第一个数字表示的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: A simple counter that can be used at any position in the replacement string.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的计数器，可在替换字符串中的任意位置使用。

trans-unit.source: Counter with a custom initial value.
trans-unit.target: 具有自定义起始值的计数器。

trans-unit.source: A counter with a customizable increment value.
trans-unit.target: 具有自定义增量值的计数器。

trans-unit.source: A counter with a customizable number of leading zeros for padding.
trans-unit.target: 具有自定义数量的前导填充零的计数器。

trans-unit.source: Display a counter of multiple custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 显示多个自定义属性的计数器。

trans-unit.source: Random string of custom length, containing uppercase, lowercase letter and 0-9 digits.
trans-unit.target: 包含大写字母、小写字母和 0-9 位、自定义长度的随机字符串。

trans-unit.source: Random string with uppercase and lowercase letters, custom length.
trans-unit.target: 包含大写字母和小写字母的随机字符串，自定义长度。

trans-unit.source: A random string that contains the number 0-9 and has a custom length.
trans-unit.target: 包含数字 0-9 且具有自定义长度的随机字符串。

trans-unit.source: A random UUID as defined by the v4 specification.
trans-unit.target: v4 规范中所载的随机 UUID。
使用高级计数器语法替换
配置是否允许运行多个实例

trans-unit.source: Explore the different ways to customize the appearance and behavior of your app. You can change the material, theme, accent, and more options to suit your style and preference.
trans-unit.target: 自定义应用程序外观和行为的不同方法。可以更改材质、主题、重音和更多选项，以适应您的风格和偏好。

trans-unit.source: <toast launch='meetingId=9813'> <visual> <binding template='ToastGeneric'> <text hint-maxLines='1'>EasyTidy has been started, please do not start it again</text> </binding> </visual> </toast>
trans-unit.target: <toast launch='meetingId=9813'> <visual> <binding template='ToastGeneric'> <text hint-maxLines='1'>EasyTidy 已在运行中，请勿重复启动</text> </binding> </visual> </toast>

trans-unit.source: Setting up your app and adjusting its operation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 设置您的应用并调整其操作参数。

trans-unit.source: EasyTidy is an open-source, professional file management tool designed to provide users with efficient and convenient file classification and organization solutions. Through custom settings, users can achieve various sorting methods such as automatic sorting, scheduled sorting, real-time sorting, and manual sorting to meet the file management needs in different scenarios. Used by the author ♥ make.
trans-unit.target: EasyTidy 是一款开源的专业文件管理工具，致力于为用户提供高效且便捷的文件归类整理方案。用户可通过自定义设置，实现诸如自动归类、定时归类、实时归类以及手动归类等多种分类方式，满足不同场景下的文件管理需求。作者自用 ♥ 制作。

trans-unit.source: Show the running log of the app.
trans-unit.target: 展示应用程序的运行日志。

trans-unit.source: Set the folder to upload files to WebDav
trans-unit.target: 设置WebDav上传文件的文件夹

trans-unit.source: The update has been downloaded. The installation will begin shortly.
trans-unit.target: 已下载更新。安装将很快开始。

trans-unit.source: Automatically fix errors in the schedule configuration.
trans-unit.target: 自动修复时间表计划配置中的错误。

trans-unit.source: List of files to be matched:
Every: Perform every {0} hours and {1} minutes
trans-unit.target: 每: {0} 小时和 {1} 分钟执行一次

trans-unit.source: Preserve folder hierarchy when processing files
trans-unit.target: 处理文件时是否保留文件夹层次结构

trans-unit.source: Please select the type to restore
Group name or task name or rule is empty
trans-unit.target: Group name or task name or rule is empty

trans-unit.source: Execute Tasks When Shutting Down Require EasyTidy To Start
trans-unit.target: 程序退出或者计算机关闭时执行，关机执行需要EasyTidy为启动状态
替换指定字符串不区分大小写

trans-unit.source: Replace specified string with case sensitivity
trans-unit.target: 替换指定字符串区分大小写

trans-unit.source: Replace the specified character with an empty character
Replace with specific character by regex
trans-unit.target: 使用正则替换为指定字符串

trans-unit.source: Replace the specified characters with spaces using regex
trans-unit.target: 使用正则替换为空字符

trans-unit.source: Substitute with a regular expression or specified characters
trans-unit.target: 使用正则表达式或者指定字符替换

trans-unit.source: Set whether to enable the mirror during updates and the custom mirror address
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在更新时启用镜像及自定义镜像地址

trans-unit.source: Drag the file here to execute automatically
trans-unit.target: 文件拖拽到此处自动执行

trans-unit.source: Used to configure the AI model calling interface and set the default model to be used
trans-unit.target: 配置AI模型调用接口，设置默认模型

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this AI service?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要删除此AI服务吗？

trans-unit.source: Set the default AI model for use

It's generally not recommended to include the Path portion in the Interface API address, unless you're absolutely certain about what you're doing. For example, in the OpenAI interface address https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions, the Path is /v1/chat/completions.
trans-unit.target: 接口API地址不建议填写Path部分，除非你很清楚你在干什么 如OpenAI接口地址为 https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions 其中Path为 /v/chat/completions

trans-unit.source: Please set the default AI first
The chat model cannot be empty
